trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Edmonds
There were no other sightings in Edmonds on or around January 17th 2009
Summary: 5 lights in kite shaped formation very high bright and glowing.
divs: Sighting DetailsI took my dog out back, and while I was waiting for him I looked up. The lights in my house were dark, and it's a very clear night so I had a really good look at the night sky. I noticed a grouping of lights that were very close together and emitting a bright glow. There were 5 lights, in a kite formation-- basically a diamond shape with a tail. I got my husband and we studied this until the fog moved in-- about a half hour. They pulsated light, and moved around quite a bit, but always returning to the same formation after "swarming" I would call it. The lights were very high, but obviously closer than stars, and were definitely not stars. If you looked away from the formation you could see a bluish glow around the formation, unlike a star.
